cmb:
MANA COST: 90
COOLDOWN: 19/17/15/13
desc: Rushes to a target location while slowing the movement speed of all enemies along its path for 3 seconds.
notes: Faceless Void is invulnerable while using Time Walk.
lore: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.
name: faceless_void_time_walk

desc: Faceless Void dodges damage by jumping backward in time, eluding both physical and magical attacks.
notes:
Stacks with evasion.
Abilities that grant True Strike don't work against Backtrack.
lore: Darkterror sees what has yet to be seen.
name: faceless_void_backtrack

desc: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.
notes:
Stun works on magic immune units.
Does not stack with Skull Basher.
Deals twice as much damage if the unit is in Chronosphere.
lore: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.
name: faceless_void_time_lock

attrib:
RADIUS: 425
DURATION: 4 / 4.5 / 5
SCEPTER DURATION: 4 / 5 / 6
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 60
cmb:
MANA COST: 150/225/300
COOLDOWN: 130/115/100
desc:
Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence. Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected. Invisible units in the sphere will be revealed.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
Pauses all units and buildings, friendly or enemy, except those owned by Faceless Void.
Faceless Void is never affected by Chronospheres with any owner.
Reveals invisible units.
Void have 1000 movespeed and phase while in Chronosphere
lore: When a rift opens to Claszureme, all poor souls caught within will likely never return.
name: faceless_void_chronosphere
